.. Ogata-TMD documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Apr 16 14:17:54 2019.

Ogata-TMD
=========

Ogata-TMD package for performing fast Hankel transforms for applications to TMDs.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
